metadata.name: RemembrAll
metadata.description:
RRememberAll Adds icons indicating remaining rooms to visit and objectives to complete, to avoid forgetting them.
I highly recommend installing [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487535818]Mod Config Menu - Continued[/url] to enable/disable rooms and other options [img]https://i.imgur.com/UHABsZv.gif[/img]
This mod is compatible with Tainted rooms
Should be compatible with any mod that changes sprites or adds custom rooms.
Created with the [url=https://isaacscript.github.io]IsaacScript[/url] framework,
The development of this mod is temporarily slowed down, I'll be back soon.
Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
